name: Damage Up
description: Increases damage of your main, sub, and special weapons.

name: Defense Up
description: Reduces damage taken from all attacks.

name: Ink Saver (Main)
description: Decreases amount of ink consumed by your main weapon.

name: Ink Saver (Sub)
description: Decreases amount of ink consumed by your sub weapon.

name: Ink Recovery Up
description: Increases ink-tank refill rate while submerged in squid form.

name: Run Speed Up
description: Increases movement speed in inkling form.

name: Swim Speed Up
description: Increases movement speed while swimming in squid form.

name: Special Charge Up
description: Increases special-guage fill rate.

name: Special Duration Up
description: Increases usage time of special weapons.

name: Quick Respawn
description: Decreases respawn time after getting splatted.

name: Special Saver
description: Reduces special-guage decrease after getting splatted.

name: Quick Super Jump
description: Increases Super Jump speed.

name: Bomb Range Up
description: Makes bombs, Point Sensors, and Disruptors travel farther when thrown.

name: Opening Gambit
description: Boosts your speed in both Inkling and squid form for the first 30 seconds of battle.

name: Last-Ditch Effort
description: Boosts ink recovery rate and weapon ink efficiency for the last 30 seconds of battle.

name: Tenacity
description: Fills special guage automatically if your team has fewer active members than the enemy.

name: Comeback
description: Boosts some of your abilities for a short time after respawning.

name: Cold Blooded
description: Shortens the effect of attacks that let enemies track your position, such as Point Sensors.

name: Ninja Squid
description: Leaves no trace when swimming in inked ground, but reduces swim speed slightly.

name: Haunt
description: Reveals the position of any player who splats you to your team for a short time.

name: Recon
description: Allows you to see the opposing team on the map while standing on your spawn points.

name: Bomb Sniffer
description: Reveals traps and hidden bombs placed by your opponents.

name: Ink Resistance Up
description: Reduces damage and movement penalties incurred when moving through enemy ink.

name: Ninja Squid
description: Hides your Super Jump landing points, but also makes your Super Jumps slightly slower.
